## Farthest Airport

library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
library(ggplot2)
view("nycflights13")
str("nycflights13")
flights
airports

farthest_airport <- flights %>%
arrange(desc(distance))%>%
slice_head(n=1)%>%
left_join(airports, by = c("dest"="faa"))%>%
select(name)%>%
as.character()
farthest_airport
